about_the_game:
Showcase your passion for "Love Spell: Written In The Stars" and support the development team with these official wallpapers and icon sets! Mobile wallpapers are included too.

Includes: Enix, Jamie, Marcello, Florian, MC, Sergio, and Aslan versions.

7 x Mobile Wallpapers

14 x SNS Icons

14 x Desktop Wallpapers

AFTER INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:


After purchasing and installing the DLC, the digital goods will be in the folder "Love Spell Digital Extras" under the root folder where Love Spell is installed.

For example, on Windows 10, this folder would typically be "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Love Spell Written In The Stars".

If you are unsure where your Love Spell game is installed, navigate to Love Spell in the Steam library, right click and select "Properties...".
Switch to the "Local files" tab in the window that pops up and press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder where Love Spell is installed.
